comments:
Build 20011108

My workspace was in a messed up state already, due to IOExceptions caused by 
being out of disk space.  However, after restarting there was a failure to start 
the debug view, stack trace follows.  Note that the resource info was present 
before MarkerManager#add was called, but then it disappeared!!

Released a simple fix that checks for null and bails out.  This is a rare case 
where, in the space of about two lines of code, a resource was deleted 
concurrently by another thread.
